projects.name: Object detection using RCNN , CNN
projects.description: Engineered and deployed pivotal models such as Fast R-CNN and Mask R-CNN to advance object detection capabilities; enhanced processing speed by 30% and accuracy by 20% to surpass industry benchmarks. Implemented region-based CNN (R-CNN) models, encompassing Fast R-CNN, Faster R-CNN, and Mask R-CNN, streamlining object identification processes; realized a 40% acceleration in processing speed and a 25% improvement in accuracy rates.

projects.name: AI-Powered Code Review Assistant
